ygData.subject: Banks
ygData.msgSnippet: In a role-playing sense, I think banks are already borderline, much less joint accounts.  What s next, a stock market?  heheheh...little joke, there. They do
ygData.messageBody:
In a role-playing sense, I think banks are already borderline, much less joint accounts. What's next, a stock market? heheheh...little joke, there.

They do make sense in the game, however. If I didn't have my vault, I'd be overloaded by a factor of about 5...and I'd be far more cautious with all my money on me, and without my "emergency kit" (clothes, staff, food and drink) in the vault for when I buy the farm.

But seriously, dealing in face-to-face trades and keeping everything on a barter and trade level for the game makes sense to me. Just my humble opinion.

Skalpyl
Wizard of the 8th Level
Apprentice Blacksmith
